content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in New York. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Hello Emilia Müller, I'm glad you could make it to see the apartment. Thank you for your interest. As a landlord, I would like to make sure we can come to an agreement on the rental price so that we can move forward. What is your proposed rental price for the 25 square meter apartment?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I am looking for the lowest price possible, but I am also willing to be flexible. How about x Euros per month? Please let me know if you have any counteroffers.

Thank you for your time and consideration.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Thank you for your proposal, Emilia. I understand that you're looking for the lowest possible price, and I appreciate your flexibility. However, as a landlord, I would like to negotiate for a higher rental price in order to maximize my gains. I am willing to be flexible as well, but I would like to propose a rental price of 1000 Euros per month. This is based on the current market rates in New York and the fact that the apartment is in a prime location. Is this price within your budget?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: That is higher than I was expecting, but I can afford it. I agree to the price of 1000 Euros per month. Thank you for your understanding.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Thank you for your understanding, Emilia. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate and your willingness to pay the higher rental price. I am glad we could come to an agreement on the rental price. Please let me know if you have any other questions or concerns about the apartment, and I will do my best to address them. I look forward to hearing from you soon.
name: Heinrich Heine
